rules.natural: If the startup faces regulatory investigation by the financial regulator, then the startup receives a penalty from the financial regulator.
Either the startup partners with an alcohol company distiller or the startup achieves product-market fit.
If the startup launches a premium investment alcohol fund product, then the startup targets high net worth wealthy clients.
If the startup targets high net worth wealthy clients, then the startup does not partner with an alcohol company distiller.
If the startup develops a mobile banking application, then under the condition that the startup does not achieve product-market fit, the startup receives funding from venture capital.
If the startup develops a trading system platform, then provided that the startup does not achieve product-market fit, the startup receives funding from venture capital.
Either the startup passes compliance with the financial regulator or the startup fails compliance with the financial regulator.
If the startup fails compliance with the financial regulator, then either the startup develops a mobile banking application or the startup develops a trading system platform.
If the technology integrates blockchain into the platform, then the startup achieves product-market fit.

Should it not be the case that if the technology uses AI analytics on alcohol consumption data then the technology integrates blockchain into the platform, then the startup faces regulatory investigation by the financial regulator.

rules.prover9_expression: (-(-(passes_compliance(startup, financial_regulator) -> obtains_license(startup, financial_regulator)) -> pivots_business(startup, new_market)) -> shuts_down(startup))
rules.natural: Under the condition that it is not the case that the failure of the implication between passing compliance and obtaining a license leads to business pivoting, then the startup shuts down.
Given that the absence of the implication between passing compliance and obtaining a license does not result in business pivoting, then the startup does not shut down.
